
#include<stdio.h>

#define MAX_SIZE 30
#define MAX_VALUE 100 

/* Hash Sort */
int frequency[MAX_VALUE+1] = {0};
void hashSort(int *array1, int size);

int match(int *array1, int *array2, int size);

int main(void)
{
    
    int cases;
    
    int size;
    int array1[MAX_SIZE];
    int array2[MAX_SIZE];
	
	scanf("%d", &cases);
	
	for( int c = 1; c <= cases; c++ )
	{
	    
	    scanf("%d", &size);
	    
	    for( int i = 0; i < size; i++ )
	    {
	        scanf("%d", &array1[i]);
	    }
	    
	    for( int i = 0; i < size; i++ )
	    {
	        scanf("%d", &array2[i]);
	    }	    
	    
	    hashSort(array1, size);
	    hashSort(array2, size);
	    
	    printf("%d\n", match(array1, array2, size));
	    
	}
	
    return 0;
	
}

/* Hash Sort */

void hashSort(int *array1, int size)
{
    
    for( int i = 0; i < size; i++ )
    {
        frequency[ array1[i] ] += 1;
    }
    
    int position = 0;
    
    for(int i = 0; i <= MAX_VALUE; i++)
    {
        while( frequency[i] > 0 )
        {
            array1[position] = i;
            position += 1;
            
            frequency[i] -= 1;
        }
    }
    
}

int match(int *array1, int *array2, int size)
{
    
    int index1 = 0;
    int index2 = 0;
    
    int matches = 0;
    
    while( index1 < size && index2 < size )
    {
        
        if( array1[index1] <= array2[index2] )
        {
            matches += 1;
            
            index1 += 1;
            index2 += 1;
        }
        else
        {
            index2 += 1;
        }
        
    }
    
    return matches;
    
}
